00103 ImBuf *get_brush_icon(Brush *brush)
00104 {
00105     static const int flags = IB_rect | IB_multilayer | IB_metadata;
00106 
00107     char path[FILE_MAX];
00108     char *folder;
00109 
00110     if (!(brush->icon_imbuf)) {
00111         if (brush->flag & BRUSH_CUSTOM_ICON) {
00112 
00113             if (brush->icon_filepath[0]) {
00114                 // first use the path directly to try and load the file
00115 
00116                 BLI_strncpy(path, brush->icon_filepath, sizeof(brush->icon_filepath));
00117                 BLI_path_abs(path, G.main->name);
00118 
00119                 brush->icon_imbuf = IMB_loadiffname(path, flags);
00120 
00121                 // otherwise lets try to find it in other directories
00122                 if (!(brush->icon_imbuf)) {
00123                     folder = BLI_get_folder(BLENDER_DATAFILES, "brushicons");
00124 
00125                     BLI_make_file_string(G.main->name, path, folder, brush->icon_filepath);
00126 
00127                     if (path[0])
00128                         brush->icon_imbuf = IMB_loadiffname(path, flags);
00129                 }
00130 
00131                 if (brush->icon_imbuf)
00132                     BKE_icon_changed(BKE_icon_getid(&brush->id));
00133             }
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     if (!(brush->icon_imbuf))
00138         brush->id.icon_id = 0;
00139 
00140     return brush->icon_imbuf;
00141 }

00143 typedef struct ShaderPreview {
00144     /* from wmJob */
00145     void *owner;
00146     short *stop, *do_update;
00147     
00148     Scene *scene;
00149     ID *id;
00150     ID *parent;
00151     MTex *slot;
00152     
00153     /* datablocks with nodes need full copy during preview render, glsl uses it too */
00154     Material *matcopy;
00155     Tex *texcopy;
00156     Lamp *lampcopy;
00157     World *worldcopy;
00158     
00159     float col[4];       /* active object color */
00160     
00161     int sizex, sizey;
00162     unsigned int *pr_rect;
00163     int pr_method;
00164     
00165 } ShaderPreview;

00182 static Main *pr_main = NULL;
00183 
00184 void ED_preview_init_dbase(void)
00185 {
00186 #ifndef WITH_HEADLESS
00187     BlendFileData *bfd;
00188     extern int datatoc_preview_blend_size;
00189     extern char datatoc_preview_blend[];
00190     const int fileflags = G.fileflags;
00191     
00192     G.fileflags |= G_FILE_NO_UI;
00193     bfd = BLO_read_from_memory(datatoc_preview_blend, datatoc_preview_blend_size, NULL);
00194     if (bfd) {
00195         pr_main = bfd->main;
00196         
00197         MEM_freeN(bfd);
00198     }
00199     G.fileflags = fileflags;
00200 #endif
00201 }
00202 
00203 void ED_preview_free_dbase(void)
00204 {
00205     if (pr_main)
00206         free_main(pr_main);
00207 }

00209 static int preview_mat_has_sss(Material *mat, bNodeTree *ntree)
00210 {
00211     if (mat) {
00212         if (mat->sss_flag & MA_DIFF_SSS)
00213             return 1;
00214         if (mat->nodetree)
00215             if (preview_mat_has_sss(NULL, mat->nodetree))
00216                 return 1;
00217     }
00218     else if (ntree) {
00219         bNode *node;
00220         for (node = ntree->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00221             if (node->type == NODE_GROUP && node->id) {
00222                 if (preview_mat_has_sss(NULL, (bNodeTree *)node->id))
00223                     return 1;
00224             }
00225             else if (node->id && ELEM(node->type, SH_NODE_MATERIAL, SH_NODE_MATERIAL_EXT)) {
00226                 mat = (Material *)node->id;
00227                 if (mat->sss_flag & MA_DIFF_SSS)
00228                     return 1;
00229             }
00230         }
00231     }
00232     return 0;
00233 }
00234 
00235 /* call this with a pointer to initialize preview scene */
00236 /* call this with NULL to restore assigned ID pointers in preview scene */
00237 static Scene *preview_prepare_scene(Scene *scene, ID *id, int id_type, ShaderPreview *sp)
00238 {
00239     Scene *sce;
00240     Base *base;
00241     
00242     if (pr_main == NULL) return NULL;
00243     
00244     sce = pr_main->scene.first;
00245     if (sce) {
00246         
00247         /* this flag tells render to not execute depsgraph or ipos etc */
00248         sce->r.scemode |= R_PREVIEWBUTS;
00249         /* set world always back, is used now */
00250         sce->world = pr_main->world.first;
00251         /* now: exposure copy */
00252         if (scene->world) {
00253             sce->world->exp = scene->world->exp;
00254             sce->world->range = scene->world->range;
00255         }
00256         
00257         sce->r.color_mgt_flag = scene->r.color_mgt_flag;
00258         
00259         /* prevent overhead for small renders and icons (32) */
00260         if (id && sp->sizex < 40)
00261             sce->r.xparts = sce->r.yparts = 1;
00262         else
00263             sce->r.xparts = sce->r.yparts = 4;
00264         
00265         /* exception: don't color manage texture previews or icons */
00266         if ((id && sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER) || id_type == ID_TE)
00267             sce->r.color_mgt_flag &= ~R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT;
00268         
00269         if ((id && sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER) && id_type != ID_WO)
00270             sce->r.alphamode = R_ALPHAPREMUL;
00271         else
00272             sce->r.alphamode = R_ADDSKY;
00273 
00274         sce->r.cfra = scene->r.cfra;
00275         BLI_strncpy(sce->r.engine, scene->r.engine, sizeof(sce->r.engine));
00276         
00277         if (id_type == ID_MA) {
00278             Material *mat = NULL, *origmat = (Material *)id;
00279             
00280             if (origmat) {
00281                 /* work on a copy */
00282                 mat = localize_material(origmat);
00283                 sp->matcopy = mat;
00284                 BLI_addtail(&pr_main->mat, mat);
00285                 
00286                 init_render_material(mat, 0, NULL);     /* call that retrieves mode_l */
00287                 end_render_material(mat);
00288                 
00289                 /* un-useful option */
00290                 if (sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER)
00291                     mat->shade_flag &= ~MA_OBCOLOR;
00292 
00293                 /* turn on raytracing if needed */
00294                 if (mat->mode_l & MA_RAYMIRROR)
00295                     sce->r.mode |= R_RAYTRACE;
00296                 if (mat->material_type == MA_TYPE_VOLUME)
00297                     sce->r.mode |= R_RAYTRACE;
00298                 if ((mat->mode_l & MA_RAYTRANSP) && (mat->mode_l & MA_TRANSP))
00299                     sce->r.mode |= R_RAYTRACE;
00300                 if (preview_mat_has_sss(mat, NULL))
00301                     sce->r.mode |= R_SSS;
00302                 
00303                 /* turn off fake shadows if needed */
00304                 /* this only works in a specific case where the preview.blend contains
00305                  * an object starting with 'c' which has a material linked to it (not the obdata)
00306                  * and that material has a fake shadow texture in the active texture slot */
00307                 for (base = sce->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00308                     if (base->object->id.name[2] == 'c') {
00309                         Material *shadmat = give_current_material(base->object, base->object->actcol);
00310                         if (shadmat) {
00311                             if (mat->mode & MA_SHADBUF) shadmat->septex = 0;
00312                             else shadmat->septex |= 1;
00313                         }
00314                     }
00315                 }
00316                 
00317                 /* turn off bounce lights for volume, 
00318                  * doesn't make much visual difference and slows it down too */
00319                 if (mat->material_type == MA_TYPE_VOLUME) {
00320                     for (base = sce->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00321                         if (base->object->type == OB_LAMP) {
00322                             /* if doesn't match 'Lamp.002' --> main key light */
00323                             if (strcmp(base->object->id.name + 2, "Lamp.002") != 0) {
00324                                 base->object->restrictflag |= OB_RESTRICT_RENDER;
00325                             }
00326                         }
00327                     }
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 
00331                 if (sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER) {
00332                     if (mat->material_type == MA_TYPE_HALO) {
00333                         sce->lay = 1 << MA_FLAT;
00334                     } 
00335                     else {
00336                         sce->lay = 1 << MA_SPHERE_A;
00337                     }
00338                 }
00339                 else {
00340                     sce->lay = 1 << mat->pr_type;
00341                     if (mat->nodetree && sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00342                         /* two previews, they get copied by wmJob */
00343                         ntreeInitPreview(mat->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00344                         ntreeInitPreview(origmat->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00345                     }
00346                 }
00347             }
00348             else {
00349                 sce->r.mode &= ~(R_OSA | R_RAYTRACE | R_SSS);
00350                 
00351             }
00352             
00353             for (base = sce->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00354                 if (base->object->id.name[2] == 'p') {
00355                     /* copy over object color, in case material uses it */
00356                     copy_v4_v4(base->object->col, sp->col);
00357                     
00358                     if (OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_MATERIAL(base->object->type)) {
00359                         /* don't use assign_material, it changed mat->id.us, which shows in the UI */
00360                         Material ***matar = give_matarar(base->object);
00361                         int actcol = MAX2(base->object->actcol - 1, 0);
00362 
00363                         if (matar && actcol < base->object->totcol)
00364                             (*matar)[actcol] = mat;
00365                     }
00366                     else if (base->object->type == OB_LAMP) {
00367                         base->object->restrictflag &= ~OB_RESTRICT_RENDER;
00368                     }
00369                 }
00370             }
00371         }
00372         else if (id_type == ID_TE) {
00373             Tex *tex = NULL, *origtex = (Tex *)id;
00374             
00375             if (origtex) {
00376                 tex = localize_texture(origtex);
00377                 sp->texcopy = tex;
00378                 BLI_addtail(&pr_main->tex, tex);
00379             }           
00380             sce->lay = 1 << MA_TEXTURE;
00381             
00382             for (base = sce->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00383                 if (base->object->id.name[2] == 't') {
00384                     Material *mat = give_current_material(base->object, base->object->actcol);
00385                     if (mat && mat->mtex[0]) {
00386                         mat->mtex[0]->tex = tex;
00387                         
00388                         if (tex && sp->slot)
00389                             mat->mtex[0]->which_output = sp->slot->which_output;
00390                         
00391                         /* show alpha in this case */
00392                         if (tex == NULL || (tex->flag & TEX_PRV_ALPHA)) {
00393                             mat->mtex[0]->mapto |= MAP_ALPHA;
00394                             mat->alpha = 0.0f;
00395                         }
00396                         else {
00397                             mat->mtex[0]->mapto &= ~MAP_ALPHA;
00398                             mat->alpha = 1.0f;
00399                         }
00400                     }
00401                 }
00402             }
00403 
00404             if (tex && tex->nodetree && sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00405                 /* two previews, they get copied by wmJob */
00406                 ntreeInitPreview(origtex->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00407                 ntreeInitPreview(tex->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00408             }
00409         }
00410         else if (id_type == ID_LA) {
00411             Lamp *la = NULL, *origla = (Lamp *)id;
00412 
00413             /* work on a copy */
00414             if (origla) {
00415                 la = localize_lamp(origla);
00416                 sp->lampcopy = la;
00417                 BLI_addtail(&pr_main->lamp, la);
00418             }
00419             
00420             if (la && la->type == LA_SUN && (la->sun_effect_type & LA_SUN_EFFECT_SKY)) {
00421                 sce->lay = 1 << MA_ATMOS;
00422                 sce->world = scene->world;
00423                 sce->camera = (Object *)BLI_findstring(&pr_main->object, "CameraAtmo", offsetof(ID, name) + 2);
00424             }
00425             else {
00426                 sce->lay = 1 << MA_LAMP;
00427                 sce->world = NULL;
00428                 sce->camera = (Object *)BLI_findstring(&pr_main->object, "Camera", offsetof(ID, name) + 2);
00429             }
00430             sce->r.mode &= ~R_SHADOW;
00431             
00432             for (base = sce->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
00433                 if (base->object->id.name[2] == 'p') {
00434                     if (base->object->type == OB_LAMP)
00435                         base->object->data = la;
00436                 }
00437             }
00438 
00439             if (la && la->nodetree && sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00440                 /* two previews, they get copied by wmJob */
00441                 ntreeInitPreview(origla->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00442                 ntreeInitPreview(la->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00443             }
00444         }
00445         else if (id_type == ID_WO) {
00446             World *wrld = NULL, *origwrld = (World *)id;
00447 
00448             if (origwrld) {
00449                 wrld = localize_world(origwrld);
00450                 sp->worldcopy = wrld;
00451                 BLI_addtail(&pr_main->world, wrld);
00452             }
00453 
00454             sce->lay = 1 << MA_SKY;
00455             sce->world = wrld;
00456 
00457             if (wrld && wrld->nodetree && sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00458                 /* two previews, they get copied by wmJob */
00459                 ntreeInitPreview(wrld->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00460                 ntreeInitPreview(origwrld->nodetree, sp->sizex, sp->sizey);
00461             }
00462         }
00463         
00464         return sce;
00465     }
00466     
00467     return NULL;
00468 }
00469 
00470 /* new UI convention: draw is in pixel space already. */
00471 /* uses ROUNDBOX button in block to get the rect */
00472 static int ed_preview_draw_rect(ScrArea *sa, Scene *sce, ID *id, int split, int first, rcti *rect, rcti *newrect)
00473 {
00474     Render *re;
00475     RenderResult rres;
00476     char name[32];
00477     int do_gamma_correct = 0, do_predivide = 0;
00478     int offx = 0, newx = rect->xmax - rect->xmin, newy = rect->ymax - rect->ymin;
00479 
00480     if (id && GS(id->name) != ID_TE) {
00481         /* exception: don't color manage texture previews - show the raw values */
00482         if (sce) {
00483             do_gamma_correct = sce->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT;
00484             do_predivide = sce->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT_PREDIVIDE;
00485         }
00486     }
00487 
00488     if (!split || first) sprintf(name, "Preview %p", (void *)sa);
00489     else sprintf(name, "SecondPreview %p", (void *)sa);
00490 
00491     if (split) {
00492         if (first) {
00493             offx = 0;
00494             newx = newx / 2;
00495         }
00496         else {
00497             offx = newx / 2;
00498             newx = newx - newx / 2;
00499         }
00500     }
00501 
00502     re = RE_GetRender(name);
00503     RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
00504 
00505     if (rres.rectf) {
00506         
00507         if (ABS(rres.rectx - newx) < 2 && ABS(rres.recty - newy) < 2) {
00508 
00509             newrect->xmax = MAX2(newrect->xmax, rect->xmin + rres.rectx + offx);
00510             newrect->ymax = MAX2(newrect->ymax, rect->ymin + rres.recty);
00511 
00512             if (rres.rectx && rres.recty) {
00513                 /* temporary conversion to byte for drawing */
00514                 float fx = rect->xmin + offx;
00515                 float fy = rect->ymin;
00516                 int profile_from = (do_gamma_correct) ? IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB : IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00517                 int dither = 0;
00518                 unsigned char *rect_byte;
00519 
00520                 rect_byte = MEM_mallocN(rres.rectx * rres.recty * sizeof(int), "ed_preview_draw_rect");
00521 
00522                 IMB_buffer_byte_from_float(rect_byte, rres.rectf,
00523                                            4, dither, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, profile_from, do_predivide,
00524                                            rres.rectx, rres.recty, rres.rectx, rres.rectx);
00525 
00526                 glaDrawPixelsSafe(fx, fy, rres.rectx, rres.recty, rres.rectx, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, rect_byte);
00527 
00528                 MEM_freeN(rect_byte);
00529             }
00530 
00531             RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
00532             return 1;
00533         }
00534     }
00535 
00536     RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
00537     return 0;
00538 }
00539 
00540 void ED_preview_draw(const bContext *C, void *idp, void *parentp, void *slotp, rcti *rect)
00541 {
00542     if (idp) {
00543         ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00544         Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(C);
00545         ID *id = (ID *)idp;
00546         ID *parent = (ID *)parentp;
00547         MTex *slot = (MTex *)slotp;
00548         SpaceButs *sbuts = sa->spacedata.first;
00549         rcti newrect;
00550         int ok;
00551         int newx = rect->xmax - rect->xmin, newy = rect->ymax - rect->ymin;
00552 
00553         newrect.xmin = rect->xmin;
00554         newrect.xmax = rect->xmin;
00555         newrect.ymin = rect->ymin;
00556         newrect.ymax = rect->ymin;
00557 
00558         if (parent) {
00559             ok = ed_preview_draw_rect(sa, sce, id, 1, 1, rect, &newrect);
00560             ok &= ed_preview_draw_rect(sa, sce, parent, 1, 0, rect, &newrect);
00561         }
00562         else
00563             ok = ed_preview_draw_rect(sa, sce, id, 0, 0, rect, &newrect);
00564 
00565         if (ok)
00566             *rect = newrect;
00567 
00568         /* check for spacetype... */
00569         if (sbuts->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS && sbuts->preview) {
00570             sbuts->preview = 0;
00571             ok = 0;
00572         }
00573     
00574         if (ok == 0) {
00575             ED_preview_shader_job(C, sa, id, parent, slot, newx, newy, PR_BUTS_RENDER);
00576         }
00577     }   
00578 }

00580 /* **************************** new shader preview system ****************** */
00581 
00582 /* inside thread, called by renderer, sets job update value */
00583 static void shader_preview_draw(void *spv, RenderResult *UNUSED(rr), volatile struct rcti *UNUSED(rect))
00584 {
00585     ShaderPreview *sp = spv;
00586     
00587     *(sp->do_update) = 1;
00588 }
00589 
00590 /* called by renderer, checks job value */
00591 static int shader_preview_break(void *spv)
00592 {
00593     ShaderPreview *sp = spv;
00594 
00595     return *(sp->stop);
00596 }
00597 
00598 /* outside thread, called before redraw notifiers, it moves finished preview over */
00599 static void shader_preview_updatejob(void *spv)
00600 {
00601     ShaderPreview *sp = spv;
00602     
00603     if (sp->id) {
00604         if (sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00605             if (GS(sp->id->name) == ID_MA) {
00606                 Material *mat = (Material *)sp->id;
00607                 
00608                 if (sp->matcopy && mat->nodetree && sp->matcopy->nodetree)
00609                     ntreeLocalSync(sp->matcopy->nodetree, mat->nodetree);
00610             }
00611             else if (GS(sp->id->name) == ID_TE) {
00612                 Tex *tex = (Tex *)sp->id;
00613                 
00614                 if (sp->texcopy && tex->nodetree && sp->texcopy->nodetree)
00615                     ntreeLocalSync(sp->texcopy->nodetree, tex->nodetree);
00616             }
00617             else if (GS(sp->id->name) == ID_WO) {
00618                 World *wrld = (World *)sp->id;
00619                 
00620                 if (sp->worldcopy && wrld->nodetree && sp->worldcopy->nodetree)
00621                     ntreeLocalSync(sp->worldcopy->nodetree, wrld->nodetree);
00622             }
00623             else if (GS(sp->id->name) == ID_LA) {
00624                 Lamp *la = (Lamp *)sp->id;
00625                 
00626                 if (sp->lampcopy && la->nodetree && sp->lampcopy->nodetree)
00627                     ntreeLocalSync(sp->lampcopy->nodetree, la->nodetree);
00628             }
00629         }       
00630     }
00631 }
00632 
00633 static void shader_preview_render(ShaderPreview *sp, ID *id, int split, int first)
00634 {
00635     Render *re;
00636     Scene *sce;
00637     float oldlens;
00638     short idtype = GS(id->name);
00639     char name[32];
00640     int sizex;
00641     
00642     /* get the stuff from the builtin preview dbase */
00643     sce = preview_prepare_scene(sp->scene, id, idtype, sp); // XXX sizex
00644     if (sce == NULL) return;
00645     
00646     if (!split || first) sprintf(name, "Preview %p", sp->owner);
00647     else sprintf(name, "SecondPreview %p", sp->owner);
00648     re = RE_GetRender(name);
00649     
00650     /* full refreshed render from first tile */
00651     if (re == NULL)
00652         re = RE_NewRender(name);
00653         
00654     /* sce->r gets copied in RE_InitState! */
00655     sce->r.scemode &= ~(R_MATNODE_PREVIEW | R_TEXNODE_PREVIEW);
00656     sce->r.scemode &= ~R_NO_IMAGE_LOAD;
00657 
00658     if (sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER) {
00659         sce->r.scemode |= R_NO_IMAGE_LOAD;
00660         sce->r.mode |= R_OSA;
00661     }
00662     else if (sp->pr_method == PR_NODE_RENDER) {
00663         if (idtype == ID_MA) sce->r.scemode |= R_MATNODE_PREVIEW;
00664         else if (idtype == ID_TE) sce->r.scemode |= R_TEXNODE_PREVIEW;
00665         sce->r.mode &= ~R_OSA;
00666     }
00667     else {  /* PR_BUTS_RENDER */
00668         sce->r.mode |= R_OSA;
00669     }
00670 
00671     /* in case of split preview, use border render */
00672     if (split) {
00673         if (first) sizex = sp->sizex / 2;
00674         else sizex = sp->sizex - sp->sizex / 2;
00675     }
00676     else sizex = sp->sizex;
00677 
00678     /* allocates or re-uses render result */
00679     sce->r.xsch = sizex;
00680     sce->r.ysch = sp->sizey;
00681     sce->r.size = 100;
00682 
00683     /* callbacs are cleared on GetRender() */
00684     if (ELEM(sp->pr_method, PR_BUTS_RENDER, PR_NODE_RENDER)) {
00685         RE_display_draw_cb(re, sp, shader_preview_draw);
00686     }
00687     /* set this for all previews, default is react to G.afbreek still */
00688     RE_test_break_cb(re, sp, shader_preview_break);
00689     
00690     /* lens adjust */
00691     oldlens = ((Camera *)sce->camera->data)->lens;
00692     if (sizex > sp->sizey)
00693         ((Camera *)sce->camera->data)->lens *= (float)sp->sizey / (float)sizex;
00694 
00695     /* entire cycle for render engine */
00696     RE_PreviewRender(re, pr_main, sce);
00697 
00698     ((Camera *)sce->camera->data)->lens = oldlens;
00699 
00700     /* handle results */
00701     if (sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER) {
00702         // char *rct= (char *)(sp->pr_rect + 32*16 + 16);
00703         
00704         if (sp->pr_rect)
00705             RE_ResultGet32(re, sp->pr_rect);
00706     }
00707     else {
00708         /* validate owner */
00709         //if (ri->rect==NULL)
00710         //  ri->rect= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int)*ri->pr_rectx*ri->pr_recty, "BIF_previewrender");
00711         //RE_ResultGet32(re, ri->rect);
00712     }
00713 
00714     /* unassign the pointers, reset vars */
00715     preview_prepare_scene(sp->scene, NULL, GS(id->name), sp);
00716     
00717     /* XXX bad exception, end-exec is not being called in render, because it uses local main */
00718 //  if (idtype == ID_TE) {
00719 //      Tex *tex= (Tex *)id;
00720 //      if (tex->use_nodes && tex->nodetree)
00721 //          ntreeEndExecTree(tex->nodetree);
00722 //  }
00723 
00724 }
00725 
00726 /* runs inside thread for material and icons */
00727 static void shader_preview_startjob(void *customdata, short *stop, short *do_update)
00728 {
00729     ShaderPreview *sp = customdata;
00730 
00731     sp->stop = stop;
00732     sp->do_update = do_update;
00733 
00734     if (sp->parent) {
00735         shader_preview_render(sp, sp->id, 1, 1);
00736         shader_preview_render(sp, sp->parent, 1, 0);
00737     }
00738     else
00739         shader_preview_render(sp, sp->id, 0, 0);
00740 
00741     *do_update = 1;
00742 }
00743 
00744 static void shader_preview_free(void *customdata)
00745 {
00746     ShaderPreview *sp = customdata;
00747     
00748     if (sp->matcopy) {
00749         struct IDProperty *properties;
00750         int a;
00751         
00752         /* node previews */
00753         shader_preview_updatejob(sp);
00754         
00755         /* get rid of copied material */
00756         BLI_remlink(&pr_main->mat, sp->matcopy);
00757         
00758         /* free_material decrements texture, prevent this. hack alert! */
00759         for (a = 0; a < MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00760             MTex *mtex = sp->matcopy->mtex[a];
00761             if (mtex && mtex->tex) mtex->tex = NULL;
00762         }
00763         
00764         free_material(sp->matcopy);
00765 
00766         properties = IDP_GetProperties((ID *)sp->matcopy, FALSE);
00767         if (properties) {
00768             IDP_FreeProperty(properties);
00769             MEM_freeN(properties);
00770         }
00771         MEM_freeN(sp->matcopy);
00772     }
00773     if (sp->texcopy) {
00774         struct IDProperty *properties;
00775         /* node previews */
00776         shader_preview_updatejob(sp);
00777         
00778         /* get rid of copied texture */
00779         BLI_remlink(&pr_main->tex, sp->texcopy);
00780         free_texture(sp->texcopy);
00781         
00782         properties = IDP_GetProperties((ID *)sp->texcopy, FALSE);
00783         if (properties) {
00784             IDP_FreeProperty(properties);
00785             MEM_freeN(properties);
00786         }
00787         MEM_freeN(sp->texcopy);
00788     }
00789     if (sp->worldcopy) {
00790         struct IDProperty *properties;
00791         /* node previews */
00792         shader_preview_updatejob(sp);
00793         
00794         /* get rid of copied world */
00795         BLI_remlink(&pr_main->world, sp->worldcopy);
00796         free_world(sp->worldcopy);
00797         
00798         properties = IDP_GetProperties((ID *)sp->worldcopy, FALSE);
00799         if (properties) {
00800             IDP_FreeProperty(properties);
00801             MEM_freeN(properties);
00802         }
00803         MEM_freeN(sp->worldcopy);
00804     }
00805     if (sp->lampcopy) {
00806         struct IDProperty *properties;
00807         /* node previews */
00808         shader_preview_updatejob(sp);
00809         
00810         /* get rid of copied lamp */
00811         BLI_remlink(&pr_main->lamp, sp->lampcopy);
00812         free_lamp(sp->lampcopy);
00813         
00814         properties = IDP_GetProperties((ID *)sp->lampcopy, FALSE);
00815         if (properties) {
00816             IDP_FreeProperty(properties);
00817             MEM_freeN(properties);
00818         }
00819         MEM_freeN(sp->lampcopy);
00820     }
00821     
00822     MEM_freeN(sp);
00823 }
00824 
00825 /* ************************* icon preview ********************** */
00826 
00827 static void icon_copy_rect(ImBuf *ibuf, unsigned int w, unsigned int h, unsigned int *rect)
00828 {
00829     struct ImBuf *ima;
00830     unsigned int *drect, *srect;
00831     float scaledx, scaledy;
00832     short ex, ey, dx, dy;
00833 
00834     /* paranoia test */
00835     if (ibuf == NULL || (ibuf->rect == NULL && ibuf->rect_float == NULL))
00836         return;
00837     
00838     /* waste of cpu cyles... but the imbuf API has no other way to scale fast (ton) */
00839     ima = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
00840     
00841     if (!ima) 
00842         return;
00843     
00844     if (ima->x > ima->y) {
00845         scaledx = (float)w;
00846         scaledy =  ( (float)ima->y / (float)ima->x) * (float)w;
00847     }
00848     else {          
00849         scaledx =  ( (float)ima->x / (float)ima->y) * (float)h;
00850         scaledy = (float)h;
00851     }
00852     
00853     ex = (short)scaledx;
00854     ey = (short)scaledy;
00855     
00856     dx = (w - ex) / 2;
00857     dy = (h - ey) / 2;
00858     
00859     IMB_scalefastImBuf(ima, ex, ey);
00860     
00861     /* if needed, convert to 32 bits */
00862     if (ima->rect == NULL)
00863         IMB_rect_from_float(ima);
00864 
00865     srect = ima->rect;
00866     drect = rect;
00867 
00868     drect += dy * w + dx;
00869     for (; ey > 0; ey--) {
00870         memcpy(drect, srect, ex * sizeof(int));
00871         drect += w;
00872         srect += ima->x;
00873     }
00874 
00875     IMB_freeImBuf(ima);
00876 }
00877 
00878 static void set_alpha(char *cp, int sizex, int sizey, char alpha) 
00879 {
00880     int a, size = sizex * sizey;
00881 
00882     for (a = 0; a < size; a++, cp += 4)
00883         cp[3] = alpha;
00884 }
00885 
00886 static void icon_preview_startjob(void *customdata, short *stop, short *do_update)
00887 {
00888     ShaderPreview *sp = customdata;
00889     ID *id = sp->id;
00890     short idtype = GS(id->name);
00891 
00892     if (idtype == ID_IM) {
00893         Image *ima = (Image *)id;
00894         ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00895         ImageUser iuser = {NULL};
00896 
00897         /* ima->ok is zero when Image cannot load */
00898         if (ima == NULL || ima->ok == 0)
00899             return;
00900 
00901         /* setup dummy image user */
00902         iuser.ok = iuser.framenr = 1;
00903         iuser.scene = sp->scene;
00904         
00905         /* elubie: this needs to be changed: here image is always loaded if not
00906          * already there. Very expensive for large images. Need to find a way to 
00907          * only get existing ibuf */
00908         ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(ima, &iuser);
00909         if (ibuf == NULL || ibuf->rect == NULL)
00910             return;
00911         
00912         icon_copy_rect(ibuf, sp->sizex, sp->sizey, sp->pr_rect);
00913 
00914         *do_update = 1;
00915     }
00916     else if (idtype == ID_BR) {
00917         Brush *br = (Brush *)id;
00918 
00919         br->icon_imbuf = get_brush_icon(br);
00920 
00921         memset(sp->pr_rect, 0x888888, sp->sizex * sp->sizey * sizeof(unsigned int));
00922 
00923         if (!(br->icon_imbuf) || !(br->icon_imbuf->rect))
00924             return;
00925 
00926         icon_copy_rect(br->icon_imbuf, sp->sizex, sp->sizey, sp->pr_rect);
00927 
00928         *do_update = 1;
00929     }
00930     else {
00931         /* re-use shader job */
00932         shader_preview_startjob(customdata, stop, do_update);
00933 
00934         /* world is rendered with alpha=0, so it wasn't displayed 
00935          * this could be render option for sky to, for later */
00936         if (idtype == ID_WO) {
00937             set_alpha((char *)sp->pr_rect, sp->sizex, sp->sizey, 255);
00938         }
00939         else if (idtype == ID_MA) {
00940             Material *ma = (Material *)id;
00941 
00942             if (ma->material_type == MA_TYPE_HALO)
00943                 set_alpha((char *)sp->pr_rect, sp->sizex, sp->sizey, 255);
00944         }
00945     }
00946 }
00947 
00948 /* use same function for icon & shader, so the job manager
00949  * does not run two of them at the same time. */
00950 
00951 static void common_preview_startjob(void *customdata, short *stop, short *do_update, float *UNUSED(progress))
00952 {
00953     ShaderPreview *sp = customdata;
00954 
00955     if (sp->pr_method == PR_ICON_RENDER)
00956         icon_preview_startjob(customdata, stop, do_update);
00957     else
00958         shader_preview_startjob(customdata, stop, do_update);
00959 }
00960 
00961 /* exported functions */
00962 
00963 static void icon_preview_add_size(IconPreview *ip, unsigned int *rect, int sizex, int sizey)
00964 {
00965     IconPreviewSize *cur_size = ip->sizes.first, *new_size;
00966 
00967     while (cur_size) {
00968         if (cur_size->sizex == sizex && cur_size->sizey == sizey) {
00969             /* requested size is already in list, no need to add it again */
00970             return;
00971         }
00972 
00973         cur_size = cur_size->next;
00974     }
00975 
00976     new_size = MEM_callocN(sizeof(IconPreviewSize), "IconPreviewSize");
00977     new_size->sizex = sizex;
00978     new_size->sizey = sizey;
00979     new_size->rect = rect;
00980 
00981     BLI_addtail(&ip->sizes, new_size);
00982 }
00983 
00984 static void icon_preview_startjob_all_sizes(void *customdata, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
00985 {
00986     IconPreview *ip = (IconPreview *)customdata;
00987     IconPreviewSize *cur_size = ip->sizes.first;
00988 
00989     while (cur_size) {
00990         ShaderPreview *sp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ShaderPreview), "Icon ShaderPreview");
00991 
00992         /* construct shader preview from image size and previewcustomdata */
00993         sp->scene = ip->scene;
00994         sp->owner = ip->owner;
00995         sp->sizex = cur_size->sizex;
00996         sp->sizey = cur_size->sizey;
00997         sp->pr_method = PR_ICON_RENDER;
00998         sp->pr_rect = cur_size->rect;
00999         sp->id = ip->id;
01000 
01001         common_preview_startjob(sp, stop, do_update, progress);
01002         shader_preview_free(sp);
01003 
01004         cur_size = cur_size->next;
01005     }
01006 }
01007 
01008 static void icon_preview_endjob(void *customdata)
01009 {
01010     IconPreview *ip = customdata;
01011 
01012     if (ip->id && GS(ip->id->name) == ID_BR)
01013         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_BRUSH | NA_EDITED, ip->id);
01014 }
01015 
01016 static void icon_preview_free(void *customdata)
01017 {
01018     IconPreview *ip = (IconPreview *)customdata;
01019 
01020     BLI_freelistN(&ip->sizes);
01021     MEM_freeN(ip);
01022 }
01023 
01024 void ED_preview_icon_job(const bContext *C, void *owner, ID *id, unsigned int *rect, int sizex, int sizey)
01025 {
01026     wmJob *steve;
01027     IconPreview *ip, *old_ip;
01028     
01029     /* suspended start means it starts after 1 timer step, see WM_jobs_timer below */
01030     steve = WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), owner, "Icon Preview", WM_JOB_EXCL_RENDER | WM_JOB_SUSPEND);
01031 
01032     ip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(IconPreview), "icon preview");
01033 
01034     /* render all resolutions from suspended job too */
01035     old_ip = WM_jobs_get_customdata(steve);
01036     if (old_ip)
01037         BLI_movelisttolist(&ip->sizes, &old_ip->sizes);
01038 
01039     /* customdata for preview thread */
01040     ip->scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01041     ip->owner = id;
01042     ip->id = id;
01043 
01044     icon_preview_add_size(ip, rect, sizex, sizey);
01045 
01046     /* setup job */
01047     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, ip, icon_preview_free);
01048     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.25, NC_MATERIAL, NC_MATERIAL);
01049     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, icon_preview_startjob_all_sizes, NULL, NULL, icon_preview_endjob);
01050 
01051     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01052 }
01053 
01054 void ED_preview_shader_job(const bContext *C, void *owner, ID *id, ID *parent, MTex *slot, int sizex, int sizey, int method)
01055 {
01056     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01057     wmJob *steve;
01058     ShaderPreview *sp;
01059 
01060     steve = WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), owner, "Shader Preview", WM_JOB_EXCL_RENDER);
01061     sp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ShaderPreview), "shader preview");
01062 
01063     /* customdata for preview thread */
01064     sp->scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01065     sp->owner = owner;
01066     sp->sizex = sizex;
01067     sp->sizey = sizey;
01068     sp->pr_method = method;
01069     sp->id = id;
01070     sp->parent = parent;
01071     sp->slot = slot;
01072     if (ob && ob->totcol) copy_v4_v4(sp->col, ob->col);
01073     else sp->col[0] = sp->col[1] = sp->col[2] = sp->col[3] = 1.0f;
01074     
01075     /* setup job */
01076     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, sp, shader_preview_free);
01077     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.1, NC_MATERIAL, NC_MATERIAL);
01078     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, common_preview_startjob, NULL, shader_preview_updatejob, NULL);
01079     
01080     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01081 }
01082 
01083 void ED_preview_kill_jobs(const struct bContext *C)
01084 {
01085     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
01086     if (wm)
01087         WM_jobs_kill(wm, NULL, common_preview_startjob);
01088 }
